Text: Well well it seems that alla preteen boys here think everythng is infected with virus...

I think it is one of the best freeware movies screenshot makers.
It is easy to use, open movie, put on pause and drag position
bar on to place where you want do screenshot.
By default only setting is not very good. It does many little
shots and some fancy shades and spaces what just wastes
space and builds up image size.
I like big clear screenshots, so setting I have is
I do 4 shots, Layout
Columns = 2 Tile Width, Height = 450
Gap Width, Height = 0 Drop Shadow = Unclicked
Back Color = Black Labels = Clicked, Bottom Left Arial
Quality = 100% Progressive = Clicked
Details = Clicked Bottom Left and All file info
in the one line and it comes to something like that
http://image.bayimg.com/faofaaacj.jpg
Many many thanks for seeding, you people are just terrific, responded within a minute..
In order to use Image Grabber you may gone need install FFDShow - http://www.free-codecs.com/ffdshow_download.htm
